Bellevue.Washington Athletic Club:
The Washington Athletic Club, founded in 1930, is a private social and athletic club located in downtown Seattle.
The WAC includes five floors of athletic and fitness facilities, including a 25-yard pool, full-size basketball court, running track, handball and racquetball courts, and pilates and yoga studios. The top ten floors house the Inn at the WAC, a 109-room boutique hotel.
